alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:23PM EST until January 11 at 1:45PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River, East Fork White River. .Rainfall of 1.00 to 1.50 inches across southwestern Indiana this past Saturday night is prolonging minor flooding on the White River from near Petersburg to Hazleton. Flooding is expected to continue until the end of the week. This precipitation event also brought a short period of lowland flooding back to the Seymour area on the East Fork White River in south central Indiana. Flooding should come to an end by Tuesday morning. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Seymour. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Significant agricultural lands begins to flood. High water affects some local roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EST Monday the stage was 12.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 PM EST Monday was 12.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 6.0 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Tuesday morning by around 1100 AM CST /1200 PM EST/.
